title: Old judge hof condition a or 10 only - poor

posts.post_title: Old judge hof condition a or 10 only - poor
posts.post_content:
Hi. Looking for old judge hofs rebacked, or poor condition, or rated 10 or a....  Thanks.

 Ben

Ben - I have an SGC 10 O'Rourke for sale on my site and will be getting a Radbourn OJ (rebacked) back from SGC shortly.  Let me know if you have an interest in either.

Prices are negotiable.

Thanks, Derek
